data.name: Admin_HistoryChangeset
data.value:
This page lists all the changes that were made in the selected product. To view the details and optionally restore or purge a specific changeset artefact, click the changeset ID number.
To revert multiple items at once, select the checkboxes and then click the "Revert" button. If you select multiple changesets for a single artefact, changes will be rolled back to the earliest changeset. You cannot roll back an Added, Purged, or Rollback changeset.
